name: Throne-Cleaver
flavor_text: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

frame.name: Aggressive Frame
frame.description:
[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy slam attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

perks.description: Greatly increased sword ammo at the cost of damage.
perks.name: Enduring Blade

perks.description: Increased damage at the cost of sword ammo.
perks.name: Jagged Edge

perks.description: Sword Guard has high overall defenses, but lowers charge rate.
perks.name: Heavy Guard

perks.description: If your heavy attack consumes the last of your ammo, it deals significantly increased damage. Excludes aerial attacks.
perks.name: Shattering Blade

perks.description: [Light Attack]  : Landing three light-attack hits within a short time grants Sword ammo.
perks.name: Relentless Strikes

perks.description: Sword ammo granted for every other powered sword kill.
perks.name: Tireless Blade

perks.description: Blocking an attack immediately after guarding increases damage for a short duration.
perks.name: Counterattack

perks.description: Quick attacks immediately after swapping to this sword do additional damage.
perks.name: En Garde

perks.description: Sword Kills boost movement speed and damage.
perks.name: Assassin's Blade

perks.description: Rapid sword strikes increase this weapon's damage for a short duration. Guarding also ends the effect.
perks.name: Whirlwind Blade
